Reviews.Title: Grandmother hoping to help launch a photo career
Reviews.Author: annat "akt"
Reviews.Content: My grandson is a media arts major and needed his own good camera, after consulting with his instructor we decided on this package. He is one happy camper and I am hoping this opens up a new world for him.  The package contains lens, filters, batteries and a case. All the things he would need with the camera body to get him started. The price was right and that of course was an added benefit.

ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS 7D 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera Brand New USA w/Manufacturer's Supplied Accessories
Canon EF-S 18-200mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Standard Zoom Lens Brand New USA w/Manufacturer's Supplied Accessories
0.45x Wide Angle Lens w/ Carry Pouch and Caps + 2X Telephoto Lens W/Carry Pouch and Caps
16GB Compact Flash Memory Card + Multi 50 in 1 USB Card Reader
Full Size 50" Tripod W/Carry Bag + 3 Piece Filter Kit Includes: UV, Circular Polarizer and Flourescent Filter and Hard Case
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 7D 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera w/ Canon EF-S 18-200mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Standard Zoom Lens LPE6 Battery/Charger Wide Angle / Telephoto Lenses Filter Kit 16GB Tripod DavisMAX Bundle
